channel.title: Npc drops [pi]
channel.description:
I added some drops to my npc, and made them 100% rate to make sure I did it right, and it didn't drop anything unless I did it wrong, here's what I did....
config: [code] // Men {1,526,11,100}, {2,526,1,100}, {3,526,1,100}[/code] did I do this wrong?

item.title: Npc drops [pi]
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

I added some drops to my npc, and made them 100% rate to make sure I did it right, and it didn’t drop anything unless I did it wrong, here’s what I did…

config:

// Men {1,526,11,100}, {2,526,1,100}, {3,526,1,100}
did I do this wrong?

Read full topic
